name: Intro
_source: for;SHITASS;[x for x in ['Wriggle', 'Mystia', 'Letty', 'Cirno', 'Rumia', 'Daiyousei', 'Rin', 'Kagerou', 'Reisen', 'Tewi', 'Reisen', 'Aunn', 'Kokoro', 'Rinnosuke', 'Kosuzu', 'Suika', 'Kasen', 'Star', 'Sunny', 'Luna', 'Remilia', 'Tokiko'] if u(x) and u(x).team == 'player' and u(x).party == 'Reimu' and game.check_alive(x)]
